about_the_game:
House of Horrors: Don't Become Dinner

Lost. Alone. Hunted.


A dense fog swallows the woods, chilling you to the bone. Lost and desperate, you stumble upon a looming mansion, its windows dark and menacing. Seeking refuge for the night, you step inside, unaware of the horrors that lurk within.

Welcome to your worst nightmare.


House of Horrors is a heart-pounding survival horror experience that will test your will to survive. Explore the decaying halls of a derelict mansion, each creaking floorboard and flickering candle a portent of the terror to come.

Unmask the Darkness:


  • Fight for your life: Scavenge for weapons and use your environment to your advantage. Defend yourself against deranged cannibals and bloodthirsty maniacs who call this house their domain.
  • Unravel a twisted past: Uncover the chilling secrets hidden within the mansion's dusty walls. Solve puzzles, decipher cryptic clues, and piece together the history of this macabre place.
  • Every choice matters: Your decisions determine your fate. Choose to confront the horrors head-on, or use stealth and cunning to outmaneuver your pursuers. Can you escape with your sanity intact?

Features:


  • Intense atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a world of dread with chilling sound design and haunting visuals.
  • Brutal combat: Utilize improvised weapons and craft traps to fend off relentless enemies.
  • Exploration and discovery: Uncover the mansion's dark secrets as you navigate its perilous depths.
  • Multiple endings: Every choice you make shapes the outcome of your fight for survival.

House of Horrors is not for the faint of heart. Do you have the courage to face the terrors within, or will you become another victim of this house's insatiable hunger?

short_description: Lost in the woods, you seek refuge in a desolate mansion. Big mistake. Now you're trapped with bloodthirsty maniacs and ravenous cannibals. Fight for your life, solve chilling mysteries, and escape this house of horrors before you become dinner.
